name: Hole In Run
description:
NOTE: I HIGHLY SUGGEST USING THE WINDOWS VERSION, WEBPLAYER CAN  BE VERY LAGGY! 

Hole In Run is a level-styled golf game, where it's just you playing golf. Simple, right?

The catch is, there is a black hole that grows bigger for every shot you miss. If it gets too big, it consumes your whole screen and gives you a game over.

Oh yeah, there is also Portals you can go through, as well as jump pads you can use.

One last thing, the hole at the end of the golf level is actually a wormhole that sends you to another dimension. Good luck!

Fullscreen only works in Windows! 

PS, ESC to quit!
